statements: SELECT * FROM events ORDER BY event_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT event_name, event_location, ticket_price FROM events WHERE event_date = '2022-12-31'
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events ORDER BY ticket_price ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_location IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM events WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY event_date ASC
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_location = 'New York' AND ticket_price < 100 ORDER BY ticket_price ASC
SELECT event_name, event_date, ticket_price FROM events WHERE ticket_price BETWEEN 25 AND 75 ORDER BY event_name
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2023-01-01' AND event_date <= '2023-06-30' ORDER BY event_date
SELECT event_name, event_location, ticket_price FROM events WHERE event_location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY ticket_price DESC
SELECT * FROM event;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM event WHERE event_location='New York';
SELECT event_name, event_date, attendee_name FROM event INNER JOIN attendee ON event.event_id = attendee.event_id;
SELECT * FROM attendee WHERE attendee_email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM event ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM event WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' AND event_location = 'New York';
SELECT attendee_name, event_name FROM attendee JOIN event ON attendee.event_id = event.event_id;
SELECT * FROM event WHERE event_location LIKE '%Los Angeles%' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, COUNT(attendee_id) AS total_attendees FROM event JOIN attendee ON event.event_id = attendee.event_id GROUP BY event_name HAVING total_attendees > 10;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendees WHERE attendee_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sale_date, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT attendees.attendee_name, events.event_name, ticket_sales.ticket_price FROM attendees JOIN ticket_sales ON attendees.attendee_id = ticket_sales.attendee_id JOIN events ON attendees.event_id = events.event_id WHERE events.event_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT events.event_name, COUNT(attendees.attendee_id) AS total_attendees FROM events LEFT JOIN attendees ON events.event_id = attendees.event_id GROUP BY events.event_name;

SELECT events.event_name, MAX(ticket_sales.ticket_price) as max_ticket_price FROM events JOIN attendees ON events.event_id = attendees.event_id JOIN ticket_sales ON attendees.attendee_id = ticket_sales.attendee_id GROUP BY events.event_name;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_location = 'New York';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM attendees WHERE first_name = 'Alice';
SELECT attendee_id, first_name, last_name FROM attendees WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events WHERE event_location = 'New York' ORDER BY event_name;

SELECT purchases.purchase_id, tickets.ticket_id, events.event_name, attendees.first_name, purchases.purchase_date FROM purchases JOIN tickets ON purchases.ticket_id = tickets.ticket_id JOIN events ON tickets.event_id = events.event_id JOIN attendees ON tickets.attendee_id = attendees.attendee_id ORDER BY purchases.purchase_date DESC;

SELECT attendees.first_name, events.event_name, tickets.ticket_price FROM attendees JOIN tickets ON attendees.attendee_id = tickets.attendee_id JOIN events ON tickets.event_id = events.event_id WHERE tickets.ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY tickets.ticket_price DESC;
SELECT event_name, COUNT(*) AS total_tickets_sold FROM events JOIN tickets ON events.event_id = tickets.event_id GROUP BY event_name ORDER BY total_tickets_sold DESC;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, location, event_date FROM events WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT attendee_name, email FROM attendees WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT ticket_type, price FROM tickets ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT organizer_name, organizer_email FROM event_organizers;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC, location ASC, event_name
SELECT attendee_name, email, registration_date FROM attendees WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01' AND email LIKE '%@example.com%'
SELECT ticket_type, price, purchase_date FROM tickets WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT event_name, location, capacity FROM events WHERE location = 'New York' OR location = 'Los Angeles'
SELECT organizer_name, organizer_email, organizer_phone_number FROM event_organizers
